name: Doki Doki Another Moment With You
storyline: Another Moment With You is a very interesting episodic experience. Each episode will force you to travel through the inner demons that torment the four girls, allowing you to see things from their perspectives and put yourself in their shoes. Focusing purely on the overarching story design, Another Moment With You is a moving and thrilling experience that will have you hooked from the start.
summary: Doki Doki: Another Moment With You is a mod for Doki Doki Literature Club! that expands the original game experience, adding new events, interactions and an in-depth storyline for the characters.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
